name: Apocalypse Survive: Horror Shooting 360 Game
description:
"Apocalypse Survive" : This is a shooting game series of different themes with unique 360 degree play feature. Game also supports VR for iPhones.

Current Theme: Halloween Pumpkin Monsters

This is not a game you just sit and play. You need to stand up and look around in the game world through your iPhone or iPad screen. OR you can play in VR headsets using your iPhone.

Look around, aim and shoot the evil pumpkin monsters coming towards you. Shoot them before they blast you!

Grab health potions to recover your health. Gems can help you to revive once in a gameplay.

Features:
- Unique and Original 360 game for iPhone as well as iPad
- VR support for iPhone
- Perfect horror ambiance
- Perfect VR environment, music and effects that you have never experience in VR
- Challenging gameplay
- Engage and compete with other players on leaderboard.
-No VR sickness

Keep Shooting -> -> ->
